COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108
STRING: We finished our morning rehearsals, and were standing
off to the side of the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114
STRING: I'd been unable to relax since last night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120
STRING: I didn't really feel that I was into it when we rehearsed
this morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: But even then I sang naturally without a thought, and
soon found myself absorbed in the song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: When I was singing, that was the only time I could truly
forget everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: The two of us spoke with Ms. Cordell, and soon we
heard the sound of the buzzer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: From the slit of the curtain, we could see that the hall
had gone dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: A voice announcing the recital program resounded, and
the stage curtain was raised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4
STRING: We stood at the back of the stage, me with a score in
my hand, and Chris with his score and Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: [Cordell] “Show them what you can do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc
STRING: Ms. Cordell urged us on in a small voice, and as if
receiving an actual push, we stepped forward onto the
stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234
STRING: Unlike the periodic recitals we did, the applause was
thunderous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: So loud that it hurt the ears, and coupled with the
bright lights shining down on us, I felt like we were
being put on the witness stand in a courtroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: Barely overcoming the illusion, I whispered a pep talk to
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: [Torta] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: [Torta] “Let's give it our best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: Chris looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308
STRING: I felt a sensation of our feelings being as one, and again,
a moment of sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e
STRING: And then, the music suddenly began.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: Apparently our recital was a huge success.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f6
STRING: I had no idea what was going on, but all I needed to do
was keep smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: One voice said we did well, another praised us saying it
was wonderful, but it all went in one ear and out the
other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x422
STRING: Wanting only to exchange greetings with Asino, we
moved off to the side in an attempt not to get swept up
in the crowd of people, and waited for Asino to
appear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x442
STRING: This was the only entrance, he had to come through
here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46a
STRING: [Fal] “Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2
STRING: I was taken aback at being approached suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be
STRING: It was a familiar voice, and it belonged to Falsita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: [Fal] “I listened to your performance. It was very
impressive.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51c
STRING: A little perplexed, I somehow remained collected, and
responded to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x544
STRING: [Fal] “I listened to everyone today, but Chris you really
were the best tonight. I almost regret that I wasn't able
to sing with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: [Torta] “It's a compliment, so you should take it that
way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: [Fal] “Yes that's right. I'm sorry if it sounded a little
ambiguous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: [Chris] “But your recital is tomorrow, isn't it Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: [Fal] “That's right. Vocal course recitals start tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: [Chris] “You aren't by chance going to listen to all the
recitals tomorrow too, are you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ae
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not. I'm only listening to all of the
Fortelle recitals. Hopefully it will be of some use to me
when I graduate and become a professional musician.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Chris] “You're so diligent...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ec
STRING: This meant that she also listened to Asino's recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f8
STRING: I wasn't sure in the end what she had thought, but she
had a smile on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72a
STRING: [Fal] “Well then, I had best be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: [Fal] “I shouldn't impose, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: Saying this, Falsita disappeared through the school
gates.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: And immediately after that, Asino appeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: [Asino] “Look who it is!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x818
STRING: [Chris] “Asino. Good performance! You're a bit late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, I got a grilling from Ms. Cordell. She said I
still have a long way to go. What about you guys?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86a
STRING: [Torta] “She smothered us with praise, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89c
STRING: [Asino] “...No way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ce
STRING: [Chris] “Really. She was in a surprisingly good mood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: [Asino] “She's always different when it comes to you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x932
STRING: [Chris] “Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x964
STRING: [Asino] “Nah, it's nothing. Oh well! I did my best either
way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I heard you play, I thought you did good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: [Asino] “Thanks. But, with you being praised like that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9dc
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell is strict, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, I know. But, it's not just that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway, I'm in a bit of a rush, sorry guys.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa68
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? A rush?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9a
STRING: [Asino] “I have to meet someone. It's none of your
business.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xacc
STRING: [Chris] “That's kind of not the point...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae2
STRING: After Chris said that, Asino glanced at me quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaee
STRING: If he's meeting someone... Could it be Falsita?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb16
STRING: [Asino] “Don't worry about it. Anyway, I have to get
going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb48
STRING: [Chris] “Alright. Guess I'll see you next at the graduation
ceremony?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: [Asino] “You guessed right. Anyway, see you guys
around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb84
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: Asino ran off in the direction of the Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: It would have been normal to assume that the glance
he gave me meant that he was going to meet up with
Falsita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbca
STRING: But, she had just left the school campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: I felt that something was a little odd, but I didn't have
the time to be concerning myself with other people's
matters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: We didn't have anything in particular that we needed to
do here, so we ended up going home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: While we were walking home, I looked back several
times while being careful not be caught by Chris, but
there were no signs of Asino coming out of the
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I'll see you later tonight, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc62
STRING: We parted ways at the same intersection that we
always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: I had my hands full just thinking about my own things at
the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: I decided to forget about Asino and Falsita for now, and
just focus on myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: Myself, and the person I loved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: Gazing at Chris from behind, I thought I would watch
him until he was out of sight, but perhaps he had felt
my eyes on him, as he suddenly turned around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2e
STRING: The question Chris asked was what anyone would have
asked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... I'll come see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd58
STRING: [Chris] “S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be there, so wait for me, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8c
STRING: [Chris] “Seriously, is everything alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda2
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, I'm sorry... I mean, sorry for holding you
up, everything's fine!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: [Chris] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: [Torta] “Well, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: I ran off and kept running as I apologized to Chris inside
my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe18
STRING: What I was getting ready to do was terrible, and
practically a betrayal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2e
STRING: But, even after all of this, if he still chooses my name...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe44
STRING: That would change everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: The time was just after nine o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: I made up an excuse for not eating dinner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: I really wanted to have gone and concluded everything,
and been back by this time...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: But here I was, still unable to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Torta] “Arietta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: My room didn't have a mirror, so I had the feeling it was
going to be hard to get my hair right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: But there really wasn't any need to do my hair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: All I had to do was wear Arie's clothes, and go see
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: If he didn't realize it was me, and then said that it's Arie
that he loved, then I would have proof that she truly did
provide support and comfort for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2e
STRING: And I wouldn't be needed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3a
STRING: Even if the letters had been lies, there is still the fact
that he continued this for three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf50
STRING: Chris's thoughts were with Arie, and I was sure that Arie
thought of Chris too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf66
STRING: In her dreams that she didn't wake from...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: I was sure she dreamed, just waiting for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7e
STRING: [Torta] “I am... Arietta. And, I'm going to see Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf94
STRING: When I put it into words, it sounded ridiculous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa0
STRING: But, it was the resolve that I needed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfac
STRING: I put the ribbon I usually used to tie my hair in my
pocket, and went downstairs in order to go out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd2
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma, I'm going out for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: Saying just that to Grandma, who was sitting in her
usual spot, I went towards the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh, Torta... Wait a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry, I'm in a rush. Can't it wait until I get
home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104e
STRING: [Ninna] “No it can't. You haven't eaten, have you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: [Torta] “I'm not that hungry yet. I'll eat when I get
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a0
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta. I said wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b6
STRING: [Torta] “...What do you want?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: [Ninna] “I need to talk to you, before you go out. It
won't take long, so just sit down.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1132
STRING: [Torta] “What's wrong...? I'm in a hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1164
STRING: [Ninna] “Just sit down. I won't take up much of your
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117a
STRING: [Torta] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1190
STRING: I did as I was told and sat down, but couldn't help but
peek at the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: I sat in the seat that was furthest away, so that
Grandma wouldn't be able to tell I was dressed as Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ba
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta. Are you really going to go dressed like
that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: [Torta] “...What are you talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ee
STRING: [Ninna] “I'm asking if you're going to see Chris, dressed
like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120e
STRING: [Torta] “What do you mean, ‘dressed like that?’ I'm
wearing what I always wear...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: [Ninna] “That's not what you always wear. That much, I
can tell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1242
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, right. I thought I'd dress up a little, since I'm
going to see Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127e
STRING: [Ninna] “Wearing Arie's clothing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1294
STRING: [Torta] “...You can see what I'm wearing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c6
STRING: [Ninna] “I can barely see anything, but I can tell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: Saying this, Grandma squinted as she looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: Her eyes had always been thin, and it was hard to tell if
they were open or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: [Torta] “You're lying...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131c
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta. You went out dressed like that the other
day, and before that at Natale, didn't you? I had the
feeling you did, but now I am certain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1346
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1364
STRING: [Ninna] “But even then, I didn't say anything because I
wanted you to fix your own mistakes. Do you
understand what I'm saying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1384
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139a
STRING: There was nothing I could say; I just listened to
Grandma talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: [Ninna] “Tortinita. Who are you doing this for?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d8
STRING: [Torta] “It's for Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Ninna] “I see. In that case, neither you nor Chris is
going to benefit from any of this nonsense. Of this, I am
certain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: [Torta] “...How do you know that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Ninna] “It's the wisdom that comes with age. I've lived
as long as you have several times over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: [Torta] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta, go change out of those clothes right
away. After that, you can go see Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: [Torta] “I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: [Torta] “I'm going in this. You probably won't
understand, Grandma, but I don't have any other choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153e
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: [Torta] “I'll explain everything when I get home!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1586
STRING: It was already after nine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: I ran through the dark streets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15cc
STRING: [Torta] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fe
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta. You understand what I'm saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1614
STRING: [Torta] “I... Wanted to test Chris. I was going to go
dressed like this, and if he could tell it was me, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: [Ninna] “Why is there a need to test him? Go and see
him as who you really are, and talk to him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, Grandma...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167c
STRING: I returned to my room, making it obvious for Grandma
to understand what I was doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16aa
STRING: Opening my closet, I got out my usual clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: I had no intention of getting dressed up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: I had to go back to the usual old me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ce
STRING: I... am Tortinita Fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16da
STRING: [Torta] “I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f0
STRING: I repeated my name over again and again in a hushed
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: And then, I took off the clothes of Arie's that I had been
wearing, and put on my own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: Both sets of clothing suited me perfectly, as if they were
made just for me...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171e
STRING: But, I felt like my own clothes suited me just a little bit
better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: I didn't have a mirror.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: But I had been tying my hair back since I was a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174c
STRING: I was able to do it without even looking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176a
STRING: I only needed something as simple as that,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177a
STRING: to keep
being who I was deep down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e4
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma, I'm sorry... But I'm in a rush. Wait
until I get home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1820
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: Grandma's words were disapproving, but I ignored
them as I left the house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186e
STRING: Had she noticed something about what I was wearing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187a
STRING: No, she couldn't have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1886
STRING: She would barely have been able to see anything at
that distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1892
STRING: Not only the clothes, but even the colors would have
been impossible for her to recognize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x189e
STRING: There wasn't much need for her to get so angry just
because I skipped dinner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b4
STRING: No... Regardless of what it was about, I didn't have time
to be thinking about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c0
STRING: Despite running out the door, in the end, I went to
Chris's place slowly, almost as if I was afraid of rushing
things.
